recipe.title: Nacho Vidal
instructions: Bring all ingredients to a boil in a medium saucepan. Reduce heat; simmer until slightly reduced, 8–10 minutes. Let cool, then strain into a jar. Cover and chill.

For assembly: Combine tequila, Campari, lemon juice, lime juice, and shrub in a large pitcher. Place 1 1/2 cups tequila mixture in a cocktail shaker; fill with ice. Shake until frosty, about 30 seconds. Divide between 2 rocks glasses filled with ice; garnish each with a lime wedge. Repeat 3 more times. DO AHEAD: Tequila mixture can be made 6 hours ahead. Cover and chill.
